TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compensator extends System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent

summary.span: 表示所有补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 补偿器的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要编写自定义事务补偿器情况下，用户应扩展从该对象。The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator. 补偿器必须始终具有公共构造函数;否则，恢复引擎无法创建它。A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建补偿资源管理器 (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此类。The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#20)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#20)] 下面的辅助类使用此补偿。This compensator is used by the following worker class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#10)] 下面的代码示例演示如何执行此补偿和辅助的客户端。The following code example demonstrates a client that exercises this compensator and worker. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmclient.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmclient.cs#30)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmclient.vb#30)]
